title: Step Configuration
description: All steps should have a defined configuration, this is how you define the step's behavior and how it will be triggered.

title: Event Subscription
description: This background job subscribes to the ts.feeding.reminder.enqueued event that gets emitted when a new pet is created.

title: Input Schema
description: Defines the structure of the event data that will be received when a feeding reminder is enqueued.

title: Background Job Handler
description: The handler processes the feeding reminder event asynchronously, calculating feeding schedules and updating pet records.

title: Business Logic
description: Contains the core logic for calculating next feeding time and updating pet records with welcome notes.

title: Event Emission
description: Emits events to signal completion of the feeding reminder job.

title: Logging
description: Logs the background job execution for monitoring and debugging purposes.
